title: A monkey economy as irrational as ours
description: Laurie Santos looks for the roots of human irrationality by watching the way our primate relatives make decisions. A clever series of experiments in "monkeynomics" shows that some of the silly choices we make, monkeys make too.
author: Laurie Santos
keywords: TED, talks, brain, business, design, economics, money, monkeys, psychology, science
